channel.title: [317] [PK Server] [DELTA] Ownage Pkz [DELTA][317]
channel.description:
[code] Name: Age: Contact: Coding Experience: Position Other:[/code]
[b][i]Welcome to the New Devolopment Ownage Pkz![/i][/b]
| | | | | | [color=red]| | | | | | | | | | | | | | |[color]
I need:
3 Coders 1 Client Devoloper 2 Moderators
So far we have:
God Wars Barbarian Assualt Clan Wars All skills Customs
Exp leveling Wepons Amour Soul Wars Pking Quests
Pictures will be up when server first starts!
Information: I made this devolopment because i think that it will be good to make a server that will have soul wars. I am 99% finished, just adding the runescape way for it. I am trying to make the client, but i don't have much time for it. If a client devoloper could do it it would be great. I want Bluurs client if it's possible. Or any client you want. If anyone wants to talk about the server, post in this topic.
Thanks!
